H0.text: Who was the first person from the USA to win the Nobel prize for literature. Sinclair Lewis

H1.text: Who was the first person from the USA to win the Nobel prize for literature. Ernest Hemingway

H2.text: Who was the first person from the USA to win the Nobel prize for literature. Eugene O'Neill

H3.text: Who was the first person from the USA to win the Nobel prize for literature. Grace Hegger

A4.text: In 1930, he became the first author from the United States (and the first from the Americas) to receive the Nobel Prize in Literature

A5.text: In 1930 Lewis won the Nobel Prize in Literature, the first writer from the United States to receive the award
